Class Credit

java.lang.Object
account.Account
account.Credit
All Implemented Interfaces:
AccountTypes
public class Credit extends Account
Represents a Credit account, which is a type of Account. A credit account has a maximum limit and allows deposits and withdrawals within that limit.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class account.Account

    accountBalance, startBalance

    Fields inherited from interface account.AccountTypes

    CHECKING, CREDIT, SAVINGS

      public boolean deposit(double amount)
